Interface Rules

All Known Implementing Classes:
TrylmaRules
public interface Rules
Interface of game rules

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean

    Rule set that determines if given player won the game

    Rule set that determines if given move is correct.

  • Method Details

    • isWinner

      boolean isWinner​(Game game, int playerID)
      Rule set that determines if given player won the game
      Parameters:
      game - the game that is being played
      playerID - id of player being checked
      Returns:
      true if player won the game

    • moveIsCorrect

      boolean moveIsCorrect​(Board board, int endMoveField)
      Rule set that determines if given move is correct. Checks if selected field is in Available fields. It is checked after second click by current player.
      Parameters:
      board - the game board in current state
      endMoveField - the field player is trying to move to
      Returns:
      true if move is correct

    • setAvailableFields

      void setAvailableFields​(Board board, BoardField startField, boolean isFirstCheck)
      Rule set that maps legal fields that you can move to from selected field. It is checked after first click by current player.
      Parameters:
      board -
      startField -
      isFirstCheck -
